definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: These feelings are all embodiments of Steinbeck's land complex.
sentences.chinese: 這種情緒就是斯坦貝克的土地情結的體現。

sentences.english: Steinbeck wrote furiously and said that the effort nearly destroyed him.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦貝克憤怒地寫，並說寫作幾乎毀了他。

sentences.english: Covers everything from Shakespeare to Steinbeck, " the site teases."
sentences.chinese: 從莎士比亞，到斯坦貝克，一應俱全。

sentences.english: The Steinbecks are engaged in things of the mind.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦貝克家投入的是心靈的事業。

sentences.english: Covers everything from Shakespeare to Steinbeck, ” the site teases.
sentences.chinese: 從莎士比亞，到斯坦貝克，一應俱全。

sentences.english: Covers everything from Shakespeare to Steinbeck,” the site teases.
sentences.chinese: 從莎士比亞，到斯坦貝克，一應俱全。
